++ Security Standards

SS describes various methodologies to maximize [Security]. Since security is not a product but a state on a continuum, it cannot be accomplished with a single action or process. It is not even something can be accomplished or attained, it can only be relentlessly attained.

Software must meet these fundamentals in order to have the OfficiallyAcceptedCertification.

Methods employed by TheSystem include:
    * ClearOnCapability
    * IsolateEverything
